resources.string:
1. Enter names of player in the fields, Player 1 will go first.
 2. Enter how many rounds you want the game to go for.
 3. Press "Start Game" to begin game
 4. Players will take turn trying to hit balloons center using their selected item
 	Note The collection of Rectangle and Line is random!! Do note that random mean you can try many times an it may still not collect! keep trying, or use a different collection method! Note
 	a. Circle : collects everything that has center within it.
 	b. Rectangle : Has a chance to collect if center within borders, but the larger the rectangle area the lower the chance to collect object is, starting at 50%%.
 	Note Rectangle must be draw from the upper left corner to bottom right Note
 	c. Line : Has a 70%% chance of popping balloon if line passes close to center
 	Note Line has a buffer so you do not be directly on it extends out perpendicular to the line Note
 5. Game is over when the number of rounds have been reached, or their is no balloons left on screen
 6. Start over!
